articles_list_bottom.title: CRISPR plants now subject to tough GM laws in European Union
articles_list_bottom.standfirst: Top court’s ruling threatens research on gene-edited crops in the bloc.

articles_list_bottom.title: Controversial US ketamine trial sparks ethics complaint
articles_list_bottom.standfirst: Advocacy group alleges that emergency medical workers in Minnesota gave patients ketamine injections without consent, despite known risks.

articles_list_bottom.title: Former head of US CDC arrested over alleged groping incident
articles_list_bottom.standfirst: Tom Frieden, former director of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, is charged with forcible touching, sex abuse and harassment.

articles_list_bottom.title: US government failing to provide recovery plans for some endangered species
articles_list_bottom.standfirst: US agencies have no official recovery plans for almost one-quarter of the plants and animals protected under the landmark Endangered Species Act.
